summary: Lorecraft plugin for Cloaks of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 4.1+[/url]
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12092]Cloaks of Skyrim v1.0[/url]

[u]Just a note[/u]
 Lorecraft has issues right now with patch 1.6, so anything I make is probably going to be incompatible. I\'m going to wait for Arcanesmith to update Lorecraft to Skyrim v1.6 before I make any updates. Sorry for the inconvenience but I don\'t want to make a plugin that might cause errors for you guys on 1.6; as of right now any errors you suddenly run into, especially if it\'s only happening right now after 1.6, is likely because of errors from the main Lorecraft mod - for more info go to its page.

Currently, Arcanesmith has not said when an update for 1.6 would happen for Lorecraft.

[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b][u]FEATURES[/u][/b]
Lorecraft plugins made for Lorecraft v4.1+ and for [b]Cloaks of Skyrim v1.0[/b].
This adds 5 Lorecraft books for \"Cloaks - Hide\", \"Cloaks - Linen\", \"Cloaks - Burlap\", \"Capes - Linen\", and \"Capes - Burlap\". 

Only the default craftable cloaks are made into Lorecraft books, and are crafted at the tanning rack.



[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]
1) Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12092]Cloaks of Skyrim v1.0[/url]
2) Install [b][u]ONE[/u][/b] of the Lorecraft plugins that matches the version of [b]\"Cloaks of Skyrim\"[/b] you\'re using.




[b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b]
ArcaneSmith for the awesome Lorecraft plugin system!
Nikinoodles\' lovely cloaks!
Zenl and Backsteppo for the original meshes!
author: Elementroar

files.name: Lorecraft - Cloaks
